title: Robots of Brixton
creator_credit: Channel 4, Factory Fifteen and Kibwe Tavares
brief_description: Brixton has degenerated into a disregarded area inhabited by London’s new robot workforce. When the Police invade the one space the robots call their own, the strained relationship between the two sides explodes into an outbreak of violence echoing that of 1981.
